body_html:
this is expected behavior, so I'm closing the issue. (Adam's workaround in the comment above is sufficient for you to workaround)

If you are saving multiple views onto a larger Tensor, we want to make sure that the sharing is preserved when loading back, so the Tensor's backing storage is saved.

body:
this is expected behavior, so I'm closing the issue. (Adam's workaround in the comment above is sufficient for you to workaround)

If you are saving multiple views onto a larger Tensor, we want to make sure that the sharing is preserved when loading back, so the Tensor's backing storage is saved.
